project_descr: The project aims to address the risks and opportunities associated with the boom in the mining sector in African countries.  The project targets the governance, accountability and transparency and will facilitate implementation of the AU's Mining Vision.

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to address the risks and opportunities associated with the boom in the mining sector, especially in oil and gas, in a growing number of African countries.

project_title: harnessing extractive industries for human dev. (rba)
